author: mcombellack
msg: Re-enabled the sca:managedTransaction.global policy as it had been commented out but it is needed to run the payment contribution since without it when using the payment contribution it complains of a missing policy

msg: Fixed bug that was preventing the "Routing Task" submenu to be rendered.
